document.discussion_title: Women - DOUBLE DECKER AMERICANA STRIPE - Cream Multi | Keds
document.topic_text: Good News! FREE STANDARD SHIPPING and FREE RETURNS on all Keds. Caring for Your Keds To keep your shoes looking their best, we recommend: Spot wash, air dry only We do not recommend putting your Keds in the washing machine or dryer Need to Return or Exchange? Keds accepts returns of unworn merchandise purchased from keds.com within 45 days of purchase. Please include the packing slip and original packaging with your order. At this time, Keds does not offer exchanges. Please follow the above return policy and place your new order through keds.com . For more information, please see our full Returns & Exchanges policy or contact Customer Service . you might also like…
